channel.title: Nexon-World 639 - Release
channel.description:
Nexon-World Release
This file contains the cache, client and the server. [B]Download: [/B] http://www.multiupload.nl/J4TW7NBAVY
Supports All of the special weapons has a special attack, that works and is 100% perfect. A insane PvP system for pkers. A really huge server with over 40+ players always. We are very huge, we got many locations to go. (over 150). We have very friendly staffs, moderators that are always ready to help. We have ALL SKILLS WORKING, Except dungeoneering of course. We have RAIDs which means you must have 4 people party to start a RAID Boss slaying. You will gain RAID points. We have OVER 30 Bosses in Nexon-World, this means PvM is fun Revevant cave, its wildy and made just like in RuneScape. 24/7 VPS hosted dedicated server, without no fear of lag. It's really nice to play without afraiding of lag. A lot more, come to check youself the rest!
MEDIA: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/hrh9gy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/5pfxw8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/65dekn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/mcgbc4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/900uw7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/5b4u55.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/wi0in4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/v46jow.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2u5c87q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/158bg3o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/5pmlw6.png[/img]
Thanks to: Lumby and the Dementhium boes.

Here you go :): *

DONT DOWNLOAD THIS!! IT’S A VIRUS
[/quote]

Looks like it, 177.1MB for a 639 Server/Cache/Client? kek someone remove this kids link[/quote]

Did it ever cross anyone’s mind that the size isn’t the same because it has more HARMLESS content? I took the liberty of downloading, scanning, and testing in a sandboxed environment. I found no trace of malware; the link is safe.

Read full topic
